mapper.update: update news set news_title = #{newsTitle},news_sum = #{newsSum},news_source = #{newsSource},news_content = #{newsContent} where news_title = #{newsTitle}
mapper.insert: insert into news (news_title, news_sum, news_source, public_time, news_content, news_format_id, colume_id, news_creator_id, public_state_id) values (#{newsTitle},#{newsSum},#{newsSource},#{publicTime},#{newsContent}, #{newsFormatId},#{columnId},#{newsCreatorId},#{publicStateId})
